JOB DESCRIPTION:
3-5 of programming experience in C/C++. Sound knowledge of programming fundamentals, C++, algorithms and data-structures. Knowledge of hardware design would be a big plus.

5-8 of experience in QA of big data tools or large Java applications. Candidate should have working knowledge of Java and hardware. Should be well versed with fundamentals of white-box, grey-box and black-box testing. Focus would be on writing automated testcases and scripts.
